Welcome to Vplants documentation

VPlants is set of packages to analyse, model and simulate plant architecture and its development at different scales (tissue, organ, axis and plant). These packages are developed by the Virtual Plants team. VPlants is the successor of the AMAPmod software.

This documentation is in progress and many aspects of Vplants are not covered yet. More documentation about the project and this package can be found on the OpenAlea Wiki

OpenAlea released packages

Core
core of openalea (e.g., package management)

target: developers

Deploy
installation, package deployment, ...

target: developers

target: users, developers

target: developers, administrators

standard tools (stats, image, data, files

target: users, developers

Sconsx
scons extension

target: developers, administrators

Visualea

target: users, developers

target: developers, administrators

target: users, developers
